Extrusion of sketched prism 6. Extrude the sketched prism by a depth of 0.75 units opposite the normal direction. Description of the prism The prism has a width of 0.75 units, a length of 0.3442 units, and a height of 0.3442 units, with all sides parallel with the exception of the slanted side. Part 2 Construction of an array of four circular cutouts Sketching the first circular cutout 1. Extrude the sketched circular cutouts by a depth of 0.0717 units opposite the normal direction. Description of the array of circular cutouts The array of circular cutouts has an width of 0.3657 units, a length of 0.3657 units, and a height of 0.0717 units, with all sides parallel. The array consists of four circles with a diameter of 0.043 units.
